document_data.name: ''Dispelling''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Dispelling''''' was a [[weapon quality]] that could be applied to weapons. Once per day, the wielder could use the weapon to ''[[dispel magic]]'' on whatever or whoever the weapon next touched.
document_data.Creation: In order to forge a ''dispelling'' weapon, the caster must have ''[[dispel magic]]'' available.
